title: Bob Hope
summary: Leslie Townes "Bob" Hope KBE KC*SG  (May 29, 1903 – July 27, 2003) was a British-American stand-up comedian,[2] vaudevillian, actor, singer, dancer, and author. With a career that spanned nearly 80 years, Hope appeared in more than 70 short and feature films, with 54 feature films with Hope as star, including a series of seven "Road" musical comedy movies with Bing Crosby as Hope's top-billed partner.
